sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect personal information including but not limited to name, email address, contact information, and usage data when you interact with our services.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Information
sections.content: We use collected information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, personalize your experience, and for security and legal compliance purposes.

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services, conducting our business, or serving our users.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data.

sections.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze service usage. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.title: 7. International Transfers
sections.content: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on computers located outside of your country where data protection laws may differ.

sections.title: 8. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.
